nodes.text: The Eskellon Mountains was a large mountain range which straddled the southern coast of Alanciar, a continent on the Wild Space planet of Kesh. In 2975 BBY, the Alanciari Wardmaster Quarra Thayn and the Sith Tribe High Lord Edell Vrai traveled through these mountains while on the way to Kerebba and Sus'mintri, the capital of Alanciar.
